Rule: Age Rule: Being older than 24 increases the likelihood of earning more than $50k.
Marital Status Rule: Being married or widowed increases the likelihood of earning more than $50k.
Education Level Rule: Higher education, such as professional schooling, can increase earnings potential.
Occupation Rule: Both white-collar and certain service occupations can lead to higher earnings.
Race Rule: Race does not appear to be a decisive factor on its own.
Hours Per Week Rule: Both higher and lower than 40 hours per week can be associated with higher earnings, indicating complex interactions with other factors.
